text: It turns out that uncertainty quantification has very similar analogues to automatic differentiation, with pushforward methods and pullback methods with similar tradeoffs

elements.text: It turns out that uncertainty quantification has very similar analogues to automatic differentiation, with pushforward methods and pullback methods with similar tradeoffs

text:
So I went to the holidays with a high, having done something smart and useful for my PhD to end the year.... and come back to this discussion :joy:
I spent a lot of time figuring all this stuff out and finding, that autodiff and Measurements.jl (and MonteCarloMeasurements.jl for that matter) all produce the exact same results... At least my approach feels more validated now :thumbsup:
